articles.author: Washington University in St. Louis
articles.title: Brain Scans Reveal a Surprise About ADHD Medications - SciTechDaily
articles.description: ADHD stimulants may improve performance not by sharpening focus, but by making the brain more awake and motivated.
articles.content: Stimulant medications for ADHD appear to work by increasing alertness and making tasks feel more rewarding—not by directly improving attention. The drugs can even mimic the effects of good sleep, rai… [+9271 chars]

articles.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas - BBC
articles.description: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.
articles.content:
Two British campaigners are among five people denied US visas after the State Department accused them of seeking to "coerce" American tech platforms into suppressing free speech.
